description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，隶属红一方面军。1937年8月22日改编为八路军115师343旅。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, subordinate to the First Front Army of the Red Army. It was reorganized into the 343rd Brigade of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army on August 22, 1937.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间创建并领导的军队。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，由红一军团和红三军团合编而成。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, formed by the combination of the First and Third Red Army Corps.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，是组建红一军团的初始部队之一。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 福建省龙岩市下辖县，红一军团的整编地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Longyan City, Fujian Province, where the Red First Army Group was formed.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的缔造者和领导人之一，曾任红一军团总指挥。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. He served as the General Commander of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的缔造者和领导人之一，曾任红一军团政治委员。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. He served as the Political Commissar of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军早期将领，曾任红一军团参谋长。
description.en: An early general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团政治部主任。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Director of the Political Department of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，与红一军团合编为红一方面军。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which merged with the Red First Army Group to form the First Front Army of the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾长期担任红一军团军团长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as the commander of the Red First Army Group for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红四军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the Fourth Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红四军参谋长及红一军团参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Fourth Red Army and the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，是组建红一军团的初始部队之一。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，曾任红三军军长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Commander of the Third Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任红三军政治委员。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as Political Commissar of the Third Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾代理红三军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as acting Political Commissar of the Third Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，曾任红三军参谋长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Third Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，是组建红一军团的初始部队之一。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军早期杰出将领，曾任红十二军军长。
description.en: An outstanding early general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Commander of the Twelfth Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军及新四军高级将领，曾代理红十二军军长、担任第一师师长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the New Fourth Army, served as acting Commander of the Twelfth Red Army and Commander of the First Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，曾任红十二军政治委员。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China, served as Political Commissar of the Twelfth Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红十二军参谋长。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Twelfth Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，1932年3月调整后隶属红一军团。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which became subordinate to the Red First Army Group after the reorganization in March 1932.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾长期担任红一军团政治委员。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served for a long period as the Political Commissar of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任红一军团政治部主任。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as Director of the Political Department of the Red First Army Group.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军第二十一军 (闽西)

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第二十一军 (闽西)

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军在闽西建立的一支部队，曾加入红一军团序列。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army established in western Fujian, which once joined the sequence of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，曾加入红一军团序列。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which once joined the sequence of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，曾任红一军团参谋长、第二师师长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Red First Army Group and Commander of the Second Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军和八路军高级将领，曾任红一军团参谋长、代理军团长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the Eighth Route Army, served as Chief of Staff and acting Commander of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级干部，曾任红一军团政治部主任。
description.en: A senior cadre of the Communist Party of China, served as Director of the Political Department of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任红一军团政治部主任。
description.en: A senior commander of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the Political Department of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任红一军团保卫局局长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the Security Bureau of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红一军团供给部长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Supply Minister of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团下辖师级单位，后改称红一师。
description.en: A division-level unit under the Red First Army Group, later renamed the First Red Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第一师政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第一师政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第一师政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团下辖师级单位，后改称红二师。
description.en: A division-level unit under the Red First Army Group, later renamed the Second Red Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军及八路军高级将领，曾任红一军团第二师师长、343旅旅长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the Eighth Route Army, served as Commander of the Second Division of the Red First Army Group and Commander of the 343rd Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第二师政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the Second Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军首任司令员，上将。曾任红一军团第二师政治委员。
description.en: The first Commander of the PLA Air Force, a General. Served as Political Commissar of the Second Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团下辖师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第三师师长。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Commander of the Third Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第三师师长。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Commander of the Third Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领、外交家，曾任红一军团第三师政治委员。
description.en: A senior general and diplomat of the People's Liberation Army, served as Political Commissar of the Third Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，曾任红一军团第三师政治委员。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, served as Political Commissar of the Third Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略性转移，红一军团参与了此次行动。
description.en: A strategic retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, in which the Red First Army Group participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红一军团第一师师长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Commander of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红一军团第一师政治委员。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Political Commissar of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任红一军团第一师参谋长。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Chief of Staff of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国高级领导人，曾任红一军团第一师参谋长。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, served as Chief of Staff of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任红一军团第一师政治部主任。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the Political Department of the First Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团在长征开始时下辖的师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the Red First Army Group at the beginning of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红一军团第十五师师长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Commander of the Fifteenth Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红一军团第十五师政治委员。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Political Commissar of the Fifteenth Division of the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长征途中召开的一次重要会议，会后红一军团进行了缩编。
description.en: An important meeting held by the Communist Party of China during the Long March, after which the Red First Army Group was downsized.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1935年7月由红一军团改编而成的部队番号。
description.en: The designation of the unit reorganized from the Red First Army Group in July 1935.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，后与毛泽东等人产生分裂。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China, who later split with Mao Zedong and others.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军陕甘支队

zh-cn: 中国工农红军陕甘支队

description.zh-cn: 由红一、三军团主力改编而成的部队，用于单独北上。
description.en: A unit reorganized from the main forces of the First and Third Red Army Corps for the northward march.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省吴起县的一个镇，是长征的落脚点之一。
description.en: A town in Wuqi County, Shaanxi Province, one of the destinations of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军将领，陕甘边革命根据地的主要创建者之一。
description.en: A general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Revolutionary Base.

nodes.id: 陕甘边赤安县游击支队

zh-cn: 陕甘边赤安县游击支队

description.zh-cn: 刘志丹率领的陕甘边区地方武装，与长征抵达的陕甘支队会师。
description.en: A local armed force in the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Region led by Liu Zhidan, which joined forces with the Shaanxi-Gansu Detachment arriving from the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军培养军事政治干部的最高学府。
description.en: The highest institution for training military and political cadres of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任红一师师长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Commander of the First Red Division.

description.zh-cn: 抵达陕北后新组建的红一军团下辖师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the newly formed Red First Army Group after arriving in northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 红一师下辖团级单位。
description.en: A regiment-level unit under the First Red Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任红十三团政委。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, served as Political Commissar of the 13th Red Regiment.

description.zh-cn: 抵达陕北后新组建的红一军团下辖师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the newly formed Red First Army Group after arriving in northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任红二师师长、八路军685团团长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Commander of the Second Red Division and Commander of the 685th Regiment of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 抵达陕北后新组建的红一军团下辖师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the newly formed Red First Army Group after arriving in northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 红一方面军在陕西省直罗镇的一场战役，红一军团参与其中。
description.en: A battle fought by the First Front Army of the Red Army in Zhiluo Town, Shaanxi Province, in which the Red First Army Group participated.

description.zh-cn: 红一方面军东渡黄河进攻山西阎锡山部的战役，红一军团作为东征军一部分参与。
description.en: A campaign where the First Front Army of the Red Army crossed the Yellow River to attack Yan Xishan's forces in Shanxi, with the Red First Army Group participating as part of the eastern expedition force.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的位于陕西、甘肃、宁夏三省交界地区的革命根据地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area led by the Communist Party of China located at the junction of Shaanxi, Gansu, and Ningxia provinces during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省白银市下辖县，是红军三大主力会师地点，标志长征结束。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Baiyin City, Gansu Province, where the three main forces of the Red Army joined, marking the end of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 八路军115师下辖旅，由红一军团改编而成。
description.en: A brigade under the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army, reorganized from the Red First Army Group.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

description.zh-cn: 八路军的主力师之一，由红一方面军主力和陕南红七十四师改编而成。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army, reorganized from the main force of the First Front Army of the Red Army and the 74th Red Division of Southern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军及八路军高级将领，曾任343旅副旅长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the Eighth Route Army, served as Deputy Commander of the 343rd Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任343旅参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Chief of Staff of the 343rd Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 八路军115师343旅下辖团。
description.en: A regiment under the 343rd Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 八路军115师343旅下辖团。
description.en: A regiment under the 343rd Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任八路军686团团长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Commander of the 686th Regiment of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30至40年代中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。
description.en: A full-scale war fought in the 1930s and 1940s between China and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 根据中共中央指示，红四军与赣南、闽西地方武装在长汀整编成为红一军团。
description.en: Following the instructions of the CPC Central Committee, the Fourth Red Army and local armed forces in southern Jiangxi and western Fujian were reorganized into the Red First Army Group in Changting.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团是中国工农红军的组成部分。
description.en: The Red First Army Group was a component of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1930年8月23日，红一军团同红三军团合编为红一方面军。1934年1月，红一方面军被撤销，军团由中央直接指挥。1934年10月长征开始时，红一方面军编制恢复。
description.en: On August 23, 1930, the Red First and Third Army Groups merged to form the First Front Army of the Red Army. In January 1934, the First Front Army was dissolved, and the corps came under the direct command of the Central Committee. In October 1934, at the beginning of the Long March, the First Front Army was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 红四军是组建红一军团的初始部队之一。
description.en: The Fourth Red Army was one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 红三军是组建红一军团的初始部队之一，并在1932年后重新划入红一军团。
description.en: The Third Red Army was one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group and was reassigned to it after 1932.

description.zh-cn: 红十二军是组建红一军团的初始部队之一，于1933年1月改为方面军直辖。
description.en: The Twelfth Red Army was one of the initial units that formed the Red First Army Group, and in January 1933, it was placed under the direct command of the Front Army.

description.zh-cn: 1933年6月红一军团整编后下辖三个师之一。
description.en: One of the three divisions under the Red First Army Group after its reorganization in June 1933.

description.zh-cn: 1933年6月红一军团整编后下辖三个师之一。
description.en: One of the three divisions under the Red First Army Group after its reorganization in June 1933.

description.zh-cn: 1933年6月红一军团整编后下辖三个师之一。
description.en: One of the three divisions under the Red First Army Group after its reorganization in June 1933.

description.zh-cn: 长征开始时红一军团下辖的师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit under the Red First Army Group at the beginning of the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团参与了长征。
description.en: The Red First Army Group participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议后，红一军团缩编为两个师。
description.en: After the Zunyi Conference, the Red First Army Group was downsized to two divisions.

description.zh-cn: 与红四方面军会师后，红一军团番号取消，改称第一军。
description.en: After joining forces with the Fourth Front Army of the Red Army, the designation of the Red First Army Group was abolished and it was renamed the First Army.

description.zh-cn: 因毛泽东等人与张国焘等人产生分裂，第一军和由红三军团改编的陕甘支队被迫单独北上。
description.en: Due to a split between Mao Zedong and others with Zhang Guotao and others, the First Army and the Shaanxi-Gansu Detachment (reorganized from the Third Red Army Corps) were forced to march north alone.

relationships.source: 中国工农红军陕甘支队
relationships.target: 陕甘边赤安县游击支队

description.zh-cn: 抵达陕西吴起镇，与刘志丹率领的陕甘边赤安县游击支队会师。
description.en: Arrived at Wuqi Town in Shaanxi and joined forces with the Chian County Guerrilla Detachment of the Shaanxi-Gansu Border Region led by Liu Zhidan.

relationships.source: 中国工农红军陕甘支队

description.zh-cn: 原由红一军团和红三军团改编的陕甘支队一、三纵队合编为新的红一军团。
description.en: The first and third columns of the Shaanxi-Gansu Detachment, which were originally reorganized from the First and Third Red Army Corps, were combined to form the new Red First Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 新组建的红一军团随即参加了直罗镇战役。
description.en: The newly formed Red First Army Group immediately participated in the Battle of Zhiluo Town.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团作为东征军一部分东渡黄河参与东征战役。
description.en: The Red First Army Group, as part of the Eastern Expeditionary Force, crossed the Yellow River to participate in the Eastern Expedition Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团向西出击，参与建立了陕甘宁边区。
description.en: The Red First Army Group attacked westward and participated in the establishment of the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 红一方面军、红二方面军和红四方面军在甘肃会宁会师，长征正式结束。
description.en: The First, Second, and Fourth Front Armies of the Red Army joined forces in Huining, Gansu, officially ending the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红一方面军、红二方面军和红四方面军在甘肃会宁会师，长征正式结束。
description.en: The First, Second, and Fourth Front Armies of the Red Army joined forces in Huining, Gansu, officially ending the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团改编为八路军115师343旅。
description.en: The Red First Army Group was reorganized into the 343rd Brigade of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

description.zh-cn: 343旅是115师的下辖部队。
description.en: The 343rd Brigade was a subordinate unit of the 115th Division.

description.zh-cn: 红一军团改编为343旅后投入中国抗日战争。
description.en: After being reorganized into the 343rd Brigade, the former Red First Army Group was deployed in the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 685团是343旅的下辖部队。
description.en: The 685th Regiment was a subordinate unit of the 343rd Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 686团是343旅的下辖部队。
description.en: The 686th Regiment was a subordinate unit of the 343rd Brigade.
